text: Ezɨ gumazir uari akuvazir kaba, me mɨdorozir gumazir gavgavir 12,000pla amadazɨ me Jabesɨn zui. Me akar gavgavim me ganigha ghaze, “Ia Jabesɨn mangɨva men gumazibav soghɨva men amizir paba itibav sogh, egh boriba sara ia bar me mɨsueghtɨ me arɨghiregh. Egh borir guiviba ko amizir igiabav soghan markɨ.”
